Module it.polimi.ingsw.am01

Package it.polimi.ingsw.am01.client.tui.scenes

package it.polimi.ingsw.am01.client.tui.scenes
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw.am01.client.tui
     
  • Class
    Description
    AuthScene
    This scene permits players to authenticate with the server.
    EndingScene
    This scene shows the finals scores.
    GamesListScene
    This scene shows the list of available games.
    LobbyScene
    This scene is shown when the player joins a game and has to wait for other players before starting the game.
    ManualScene
    This scene contains a brief description of all application's commands and interactions.
    ManualScene.CommandDetail
     
    PlayAreaScene
    This scene contains all the elements in order to play the turn-based phase of the game.
    RestoringScene
    This scene is shown when a player reconnects following a crash server and has to wait for other players before he can resume the game.
    SelectColorScene
    This scene permits players to select color (SETUP_COLOR status).
    SelectObjectiveScene
    This scene permits players to select the secret objective (SETUP_OBJECTIVE status).
    SelectStartingCardSideScene
    This scene permits players to select the starting card side (SETUP_STARTING_CARD_SIDE status).
    WelcomeScene
    This is the first scene that is shown to the player.
